_sText:
This is a medium gun game map based on the colors of this forum. Blue and Dark grey (I´m not sure if I´m allowed to most this ling here. If not, let me know and I remove it.) All custom textures and the nav. file are packed into the bsp.file for you, to make it easier and so you cant lose any important files. Features
  • 24 spawnpoints (12 for each team)
  • Custom meshes
  • Custom textures
  • Skybox
  • "Secret area"
  • Blue lighting and cool light ramps (my opinion)
Ok, I don´t going to write much more information here becouse i think it´s up to you to explore this map on youre own. (And some people don´t read this information field anyway) Oh, I just forgot. Big thanks to Infl1ct1on and Mr.v for helping me with the beta testing. After you have downloaded this map please rate and leave a comment as well. / Alex
